rev.comment: We're not an advertising medium, or a forteller of the future
rev.diff:
Line 71: Line 71:
The name of the side project was used as a reference to the song of the same name by the [[alternative metal]] band [[Deftones]], of which Pendulum are fans. Rob Swire stated on his Twitter feed that they would be broadcasting live brand new Knife Party tracks on Radio 1 in [[Ibiza]] on 5 August 2011.<ref>http://trebloid.com/news/524/swedish-house-mafiaskrillex-pendulum</ref><ref>http://twitter.com/#!/rob_swire</ref>
The name of the side project was used as a reference to the song of the same name by the [[alternative metal]] band [[Deftones]], of which Pendulum are fans. Rob Swire stated on his Twitter feed that they would be broadcasting live brand new Knife Party tracks on Radio 1 in [[Ibiza]] on 5 August 2011.<ref>http://trebloid.com/news/524/swedish-house-mafiaskrillex-pendulum</ref><ref>http://twitter.com/#!/rob_swire</ref>
â   â
On Friday 25 November, Knife Party perform at the UK's biggest bass music all-nighter of 2011, UKF Bass Culture at Alexandra Palace.
